item.title: Aussies have fewer friends and higher tax bills, major survey reveals
item.description: <p>A new report has painted a grim picture of life in Australia, revealing a nation where people are feeling lonelier than ever, are paying more tax and delaying their dreams. </p>

item.title: Sydney doctor who paints as a hobby takes $20k art prize
item.description: <p>Sean Lee beat 43 other finalists and hundreds of entrants with his still life <em>My Pantry Essentials</em>, which depicts the sauces and ingredients that were commonplace in the kitchen, growing up in Sydney as a child of Chinese and Taiwanese migrants.</p>

item.title: Judge tosses Trump's $22B defamation lawsuit against The New York Times
item.description: <p>A Florida federal judge on Friday tossed out a $22.7 billion defamation lawsuit filed by President Donald Trump against <em>The New York Times</em>.</p>

item.title: P-plater allegedly clocked at 196km/h in Melbourne's east
item.description: <p>A﻿ provisional driver was clocked doing 196 km/h in a 100 km/h zone in Melbourne&#x27;s east overnight, police said.</p>

item.title: Man accused of trying to kill Trump says prosecutors haven't proven assassination attempt
item.description: <p>A man accused of trying to assassinate Donald Trump at his Florida golf course last year told a federal judge on Friday that prosecutors haven&#x27;t proven that an assassination attempt occurred. </p>

item.title: Taking Jimmy Kimmel off air 'unbelievably dangerous', says Trump-aligned senator
item.description: <p>&quot;When it is used to silence every conservative in America, we will regret it.&quot;</p>

item.title: Delayed maintenance left CommBank customers unable to access services
item.description: <p>Commonwealth Bank customers were left unable to access services as planned maintenance took longer than expected this morning.</p>

item.title: Trump says US has carried out another fatal strike targeting alleged drug-smuggling boat
item.description: <p>Donald Trump said the US military has carried out its third fatal strike against an alleged drug smuggling vessel this month.</p>

item.title: Man arrested after woman found dead in NSW north
item.description: <p>A﻿ 29-year-old man was arrested in New South Wales&#x27; north after a woman was found dead in an apartment.</p>

item.title: Man charged with murder after alleged altercation at Canberra caravan park
item.description: <p>A 49-year-old man has been charged with the murder of a 34-year-old man at a Canberra caravan park. </p>

item.title: Fourth death confirmed after Optus outage blocked calls to Triple Zero for 13 hours
item.description: <p>Optus has revealed a botched firewall upgrade blocked calls to Triple Zero in South Australia, Western Australia and the Northern Territory for about 13 hours.</p>

item.title: Cyberattack disrupts check-in systems at major European airports
item.description: <p>Qantas and Virgin Australia say they&#x27;re not currently impacted by the incident, which is causing delays at some of Europe busiest airports.</p>

item.title: Devastated family discover Adelaide woman desperately tried to call Triple Zero to save her own life during Op
item.description: <p>T﻿he family of a 68-year-old woman who died during the widespread Optus outage realised their loved one was a victim this morning.</p>

item.title: AFL preliminary final 2025: Collingwood Magpies defeated by Brisbane Lions, score, highlights, latest news, Scott Pendlebury and Jarrod Berry injured; Rory Sloane and Damien Barrett weigh in
item.description: In a defining moment late in Saturday's preliminary final, Collingwood star Jamie Elliott was denied a clear front-on free kick against Brandon Starcevich that could have put the Pies a goal down with nine minutes remaining. Instead, the ball was raced down the other end and in a two-goal swing, Charlie Cameron put Brisbane 18 points up.﻿

item.title: NRL semi-finals 2025: Cronulla Sharks beat Canberra Raiders as Nicho Hynes, Braydon Trindall, Addin Fonua-Blake star
item.description: Canberra's dream has turned to disaster.﻿ Three weeks after winning the club's first minor premiership since 1990, the Raiders have suffered a second consecutive finals defeat to go tumbling out of the title race via the quickest route possible. The Sharks dealt the killer blow in a comprehensive win in Canberra on Saturday night, handing the Raiders a 32-12 defeat.

item.title: Estonia says three Russian fighter jets entered its airspace in 'brazen' incursion
item.description: <p>Estonia summoned a Russian diplomat to protest after three Russian fighter aircraft entered its airspace without permission Friday and stayed there for 12 minutes.</p>

item.title: Trump's deadly strikes against alleged drug boats raises legal questions
item.description: <p>T﻿he US president insists the lethal actions are needed in the war on drugs, but are they breaching international law?</p>

item.title: Today in History - September 21: The last meal request that infuriated prison officials
item.description: <p>A death row inmate&#x27;s last meal request was so extravagant on September 21, 2011, that the state of Texas stopped doing them.</p>

item.title: Vandals deface Melbourne's Hochgurtel Fountain and turn water bright red
item.description: <p>The Hochgurtel Fountain outside the Royal Exhibition Building in Carlton Gardens was defaced with the messages &quot;sanction Israel&quot; and &quot;free Gaza&quot; and the water was turned bright red, police said.</p>

item.description: <p>The US president ﻿claimed Bondi&#x27;s lack of action in pursuing criminal charges against his adversaries &quot;killing our reputation and credibility&quot;.</p>

item.title: Optus admits it missed at least five warnings that triple zero was not working, including two from NSW

item.description: Penrith Panthers have kept their hopes of a fifth-straight premiership alive, demolishing a poor Canterbury Bulldogs outfit with a first half onslaught on Sunday afternoon.
